title: So kindred is fun, I just have one question...
body: When are we getting a sexy heartseeker kindred? ( ͠° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body: I'd be careful about saying "My heart is yours," to Kindred. They might find your terms acceptable.

I could see a Heartseeker{{champion:203}} skin working very well but I feel it would be a lot better to make them pretty as opposed to sexy. Lamb feels very reserved to me and she's already a beautiful female animal-human hybrid ghost being of a videogame character. I could see Wolf as a little cherubim with Lamb being the person he's trying to get somebody to fall in-love with as if he were Cupid. On the other hand I'd love seeing Lamb in some sort of sun dress, maybe give her some blonde or red fur ( I don't think that we have a red-headed Heartseeker skin yet ) with her bow being a harp that fires a mixture of hearts and musical notes. I think the work they would have to put into this though would make for a very nice 1820 R.P. skin but I think if the skin were done nice I'd buy it.
